common.ownersManagersOnly: This page is for Supplier Owners and Managers only.

auth.incorrectCredentials: Incorrect email or password. Please check your credentials.
auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.

register.createAccount: Create your supplier account and become the owner
register.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
register.note: Note: Manager and Sales staff cannot register here.
register.note2: They must be added by a Supplier Owner after logging in.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.webOnly: This web dashboard is for Supplier Owners and Managers only. Consumers should use the mobile app.
dashboard.subtitle: Supplier Admin Dashboard - Manage your supplier operations

orders.title: Orders
orders.viewManage: View and manage incoming orders from consumers

products.title: Products
products.name: Product Name
products.leadTimeDescription: Number of days until product is ready for delivery/pickup
products.noProducts: No products found. Add your first product using the form above.
products.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
products.onlyOwnersManagers: Only Supplier Owners and Managers can manage products. Sales staff can only view orders.

staff.title: Staff Management
staff.manageStaff: Add Manager and Sales staff to your suppliers. New accounts will be created automatically.
staff.deleteWarning: Deleting a supplier account will deactivate it. This action cannot be undone.
staff.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this supplier account?
staff.onlyOwners: Only Supplier Owners can manage staff members.
staff.selectSupplierEmail: Please select a supplier and enter an email
staff.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this staff member?
staff.autoCreate: User account will be created automatically if it doesn't exist.
staff.nameFromEmail: If not provided, name will be derived from email.
staff.noStaff: No staff members yet. Add staff using the form above.
staff.loginNote: Manager can login via web, Sales can login via mobile app. They should change their password after first login.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.subject: Subject
complaints.viewManage: View and manage complaints from consumers

chat.title: Chat
chat.withAcceptedLinks: Chat with consumers who have accepted links
chat.needAcceptedLink: You need at least one accepted consumer link to start chatting

errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
